sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Spatial tenses review:

vi = ?     va = ?     vu = ?

(Answers: here/near, there/mid, yonder/far)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
gapru x1 is above/over x2 above/over
cnita x1 is below/under x2 below/under
crane x1 is in front of x2 in front
trixe x1 is behind x2 behind

Using Position Words

lo cipni cu gapru lo zdani

The bird is above the house.

lo mlatu cu cnita lo jubme

The cat is under the table.

lo gerku cu crane lo dinju

The dog is in front of the building.

lo mlatu cu trixe lo sfofa

The cat is behind the sofa.

Combined with Spatial Distance

lo cipni cu gapru va lo zdani

The bird is above the house (mid-distance).

lo mlatu cu cnita vi lo jubme

The cat is under the table here.

Key Point

Position words describe relative location. Combine with vi/va/vu for distance.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use gapru/cnita

Translate:

  1. The bird is above the tree.
  2. The cat is under the bed.
  3. The sun is above.
Answers
  1. lo cipni cu gapru lo tricu
  2. lo mlatu cu cnita lo ckana
  3. lo solri cu gapru

Exercise 2: Use crane/trixe

Translate:

  1. The dog is in front of me.
  2. Alice is behind Bob.
  3. The car is in front of the house.
Answers
  1. lo gerku cu crane mi
  2. la .alis. cu trixe la .bob.
  3. lo karce cu crane lo zdani

Exercise 3: With Distance

Translate:

  1. The bird is above, far away.
  2. The cat is under the table, nearby.
  3. The dog is in front, mid-distance.
Answers
  1. lo cipni cu gapru vu
  2. lo mlatu cu cnita vi lo jubme
  3. lo gerku cu crane va

items.text: The bird is above the tree.
The cat is under the bed.
The dog is in front of me.
The car is in front of the house.
The bird is above, far away.
The cat is under the table, nearby.
items.answer: `lo mlatu cu cnita vi lo jubme`

items.text: The dog is in front, mid-distance.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "The bird is above." → lo cipni cu gapru
  2. "The cat is under the table." → lo mlatu cu cnita lo jubme
  3. "I am behind you." → mi trixe do

Summary

You learned vertical positions (gapru/cnita) and depth positions (crane/trixe). Combine with spatial tenses for full descriptions.
